name: Heavy Weighs The Crown
description:
To play this game you’ll need a copy of Bucket of Bolts, a solo journalling game of iconic spaceships and their infamous captains.

Heavy Weighs The Crown is a fantasy supplement that can be used as an alternative set of single-sheet content for Bucket of Bolts. 

Instead of creating a Spaceship and its Captains, you'll forge a Crown, telling the story of the Monarchs who wear it and the Realm you rule over together.

You'll play through three acts, choosing Monarchs from each list - the founders, the usurpers and the ruinations. Your Crown will change over time and develop its own storied history until your final Monarch's reign comes to an end.

It's a great way to spend an hour or two developing a short history of a magical crown, an ancient realm or a royal lineage that could be used for adventures in most fantasy RPGs (especially if they include magic & monsters).

--------

Heavy Weighs The Crown was written for the
Lost & Found Jam 2021.

It was written using the Lost & Found SRD by Jack Harrison (Mousehole Press).
